org.silex.runtime.geom.TransformationOriginValue

defined in
org.silex.runtime.geom.GeomData
The different value used to determine a transformation origin. It can be specified by a constant, representing a point (top-left, center...) or directly by a point (in px).

Constructors

constant(transformationOriginX : TransformationOriginXValue,transformationOriginY : TransformationOriginYValue)
point(point : Point)
